item.cdmoveset.katana.tooltip: After 5 seconds of not attacking, the katana is sheathed, and the next attack will be enhanced. Skills will also be enhanced.
item.cdmoveset.yamato.tooltip: A weakened version of the Yamato, you feel the unstable power from this blade.
pack.More_Power.title: More Power !!!
pack.corrupt_animation.title: Corrupt Animation
skill.cdmoveset.bloodwolf.tooltip: When the wolf howls, it is time for a counterattack. Gain the protection of the wolf god by dodging and defeating enemies. When the skill level reaches 10, you will gain the protection of the wolf god, enhancing your attacks and having a chance to interrupt enemy attacks.
skill.cdmoveset.cdparryskill: New version technical update, this skill is useless
skill.cdmoveset.cdparryskill.tooltip: Specially made parry, I don't know how to make it, don't ask
skill.cdmoveset.greatsword_dual_skill.to: A powerful ground-shaking attack that knocks down all enemies within range
skill.cdmoveset.guardparry.tooltip: Allows you to adjust your defensive stance and block all blockable attacks during the skill duration. Each defeated enemy restores one layer of defense points (the base value of defense points is 4, the Sweeping Blade enchantment can increase defense points)
skill.cdmoveset.katanaskill.tooltip: A swift thrust that pierces through enemies in its path. In a running state, you can sheathe the sword and deliver a powerful strike.
skill.cdmoveset.katanaspskill.tooltip: Adopt a stance to block the enemy's attack and then execute a killing blow.
skill.cdmoveset.lethalslicing.tooltip: Stun the enemy and deliver a powerful strike. The number of strikes varies depending on the number of enemies.
skill.cdmoveset.psstep.tooltip: Allows you to use different actions to dodge. A successful dodge can trigger special effects and restore weapon charge.
skill.cdmoveset.shiled_slahs.tooltip: Use the shield to block the enemy's attack and stun the enemy.
skill.cdmoveset.spearslash.tooltip: Grab surrounding enemies and deliver a powerful knockdown.
skill.cdmoveset.sstep.tooltip:
A meaningless dodge skill book, maybe the author was too lazy to delete it. It doesn't differ much from dodging, except that it reduces stamina consumption by 1.

(Stamina: %d)
skill.cdmoveset.sword_slash.tooltip: Spin forward and deliver a powerful strike.
skill.cdmoveset.wind_slash.tooltip: Raise your greatsword and slash all surrounding enemies.
skill.cdmoveset.yamato_step.tooltip:
Teleport in a specified direction. Dodge all dodgeable attacks.

(Stamina: %d)
skill.cdmoveset.yamatoskill: During the preparation phase of normal skill usage, being attacked by the enemy can trigger a counterattack. After 1a, 2a, 3a, you can release additional combos, and after a parry, you can release the Illusory Blade Realm for a counterattack.
skill.cdmoveset.yamatoskill.tooltip: Depending on the attack, the combo delivered is different.
